TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SynchronizationModes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The I/O file cache flushing behavior for the connection

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Mono.Data.Sqlite.SynchronizationModes Full = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Full file flushing after every write operation

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Mono.Data.Sqlite.SynchronizationModes Normal = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Normal file flushing at critical sections of the code

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Mono.Data.Sqlite.SynchronizationModes Off = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Use the default operating system's file flushing, SQLite does not explicitly flush the file buffers after writing
